00021 using Gtk;
00022 
00023 using System;
00024 
00025 using Niry;
00026 using Niry.Network;
00027 
00028 using NyFolder;
00029 using NyFolder.Protocol;
00030 using NyFolder.GUI.Base;
00031 
00032 namespace NyFolder.GUI.Dialogs {
00034     public class AcceptUser : GladeDialog {
00035         // ============================================
00036         // PRIVATE GLADE Members
00037         // ============================================
00038         [Glade.WidgetAttribute] private Gtk.Label labelTitle;
00039         [Glade.WidgetAttribute] private Gtk.Entry entryName;
00040         [Glade.WidgetAttribute] private Gtk.Entry entryIP;
00041         [Glade.WidgetAttribute] private Gtk.Image image;
00042 
00043         // ============================================
00044         // PUBLIC Constructors
00045         // ============================================
00047         public AcceptUser (PeerSocket peer) : 
00048             base("dialog", "AcceptUserDialog.glade")
00049         {
00050             // Get UserInfo
00051             UserInfo userInfo = peer.Info as UserInfo;
00052 
00053             // Initialize GUI
00054             this.labelTitle.Text = "<span size='x-large'><b>Accept User</b> (";
00055             if (userInfo.SecureAuthentication == true) {
00056                 this.image.Pixbuf = StockIcons.GetPixbuf("SecureAuth");
00057                 this.labelTitle.Text += "Secure";
00058                 this.Dialog.Title += " (Secure Authentication)";
00059             } else {
00060                 this.image.Pixbuf = StockIcons.GetPixbuf("InsecureAuth");
00061                 this.labelTitle.Text += "Insecure";
00062                 this.Dialog.Title += " (Insecure Authentication)";
00063             }
00064             this.labelTitle.Text += ")</span>";
00065             this.labelTitle.UseMarkup = true;
00066 
00067             entryName.Text = userInfo.Name;
00068             entryIP.Text = peer.GetRemoteIP().ToString();
00069         }
00070     }
00071 }
